text: Hancockiidae is a family of sea slugs, nudibranchs, marine gastropod mollusks in the superfamily Tritonioidea. This family is within the clade Cladobranchia (according to the taxonomy of the Gastropoda by Bouchet & Rocroi, 2005). == Taxonomy == The family Hancockiidae has no subfamilies and only one genus. It is closely allied to the family Dotidae. ==Genera == The family Hancockiidae has only one valid genus: * Hancockia, the type genus * Govia Trinchese, 1885 is considered to be a synonym and its type species Govia rubra Trinchese, 1885 is considered to be a synonym of Hancockia uncinata, type species of the genus Hancockia. ==References== * Thompson, T. E., & Brown, G.H., 1984. Biology of opisthobranch Molluscs. Vol. 2. Ray Society; London. 1-229, p.20
title: Hancockiidae
